name: U.K. Subs
description: '''U.K. Subs''' are an English [[punk rock]] band, among the earliest in the first wave of British punk. Formed in 1976, the mainstay of the band has been vocalist [[Charlie Harper (singer)|Charlie Harper]], originally a singer in Britain's [[Rhythm and blues|R&B]] scene. One of the first [[hardcore punk]] bands, elements of rhythm and blues music - including harmonica - also remained an occasional element of their work.
